column2: As a member of the [lamb_cult.GetName], you have begun a dive into the legends of the Saints, uncovering a strange familiarity of these tales with the Christians of the South, perhaps you have more in common then you think...
Christ was a great shepard as much as he was a warrior...

As a member of the [hiddenfolk_cult.GetName], you have begun a dive into the legends of the Huntsmen, uncovering a strange familiarity of these tales with tales of other great and legendary warriors among the Stories of Other People...
Was the Huntsmen the only great one on the battlefield of Ragnarok?
